name: Wedding Planning
description: Let us make your dream wedding a reality. Our expert wedding planners will handle every detail.
customization: Fully customizable to suit your preferences
testimonials: Our wedding was perfect, thanks to their attention to detail!
booking_process: Book online or schedule an in-person consultation
cancellation_policy: Cancellation with full refund allowed up to 30 days before the event

faqs.question: Can we choose our own menu for catering?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can customize the catering menu to your preferences.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum guest count for this package?
faqs.answer: No, we can accommodate events of all sizes.

name: Birthday Party Package
description: Celebrate your special day with our all-inclusive birthday party package, including decorations and entertainment.
venue_options: Indoor and outdoor venue options available
customization: Customize the theme and decorations to your liking
testimonials: Our daughter's birthday was a blast! Thanks to the amazing party package.
Highly recommended for stress-free birthday celebrations!
booking_process: Book online or call our party planning team
cancellation_policy: Cancellation with full refund allowed up to 7 days before the party

faqs.question: Can we bring our own cake?
faqs.answer: Yes, you are welcome to bring your own cake.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum guest count for this package?
faqs.answer: No, we can accommodate small and large parties.

name: Retirement Celebration
description: Celebrate retirement in style with our specially designed retirement celebration package.
customization: Personalize the theme and music selection
testimonials: My retirement party was a night to remember! Thanks to the retirement celebration package.
cancellation_policy: Cancellation with full refund allowed up to 14 days before the event

faqs.question: Can we bring our own music playlist?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can provide your own music playlist for the party.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum guest count for this package?
faqs.answer: No, we can host intimate or large retirement celebrations.

name: Anniversary Celebration
description: Make your anniversary memorable with our anniversary celebration package, including romantic setups.
customization: Personalize the setup and music selection
testimonials: Our anniversary was a magical evening thanks to the anniversary celebration package.
cancellation_policy: Cancellation with full refund allowed up to 7 days before the event

faqs.question: Can we request specific songs for the live music?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can provide a list of your favorite songs for the live music.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum guest count for this package?
faqs.answer: No, we cater to couples celebrating their special day.

name: Baby Shower Planning
description: Welcome the new addition to your family with a beautifully organized baby shower.
customization: Choose a baby shower theme and customize decorations
testimonials: Our baby shower was a joyous occasion, thanks to the baby shower planning services.
booking_process: Book online or call our baby shower coordinator
cancellation_policy: Cancellation with full refund allowed up to 7 days before the event

faqs.question: Can we bring our own baby shower games?
faqs.answer: Yes, you are welcome to bring your own games.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum guest count for this package?
faqs.answer: No, we can accommodate intimate or large baby showers.

name: Holiday Party Services
description: Spread holiday cheer with our holiday party services, featuring festive decorations and catering.
customization: Customize the holiday theme and menu
testimonials: Our holiday party was a hit! Thanks to the holiday party services.
booking_process: Book online or call our holiday party coordinator
cancellation_policy: Cancellation with full refund allowed up to 14 days before the event

faqs.question: Can we request specific holiday songs for the music?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can provide a list of your favorite holiday songs.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum guest count for this package?
faqs.answer: No, we can host small and large holiday parties.
